fill < pull (out) < pour (out)

𓎕

𒉺𒇻 pa-lu pour (out) ⇔ pull, fill

amphore > ampulle > •µvull

𒅎𒇻𒌑 im-lu-ú imƒillú fill

mull mill µfill

malû מָלֵא malé መልአ mälʾä مَلَأَ malaʾa "fill"

𒀯𒇻 mul-lu mullu filling (up), replenishment

𒌑𒂷𒇷 ú-mal-li umalli µfill

𒋛 SI fill <> 𒈠 Mar 𒈣 MA maru mallu …

malû ≈ manu 𓂠

ii 23 … 𒊭 𒀭𒊹 𒌋 𒀭15 𒌑𒂷𒇻𒌋 𒋡𒀀𒌅𒌋𒀀
ii 23 … ša AN.ŠÁR u d15 ú-mal-lu-u qa-a-tu-u-a
ii 23 … that Aššur and Ištar had placed in my hands
